title: What are some alternatives to library.nu? - Quora

response.answer_text: Surprised to see this question has 1k+ followers. Library(dot)nu was the biggest e-book library. I miss that websites. But,here are some similar alternative website which could let you download e-book for free: Library Genesis (Library Genesis) : More than 2 million books and files are available here. E-Books Directory (E-Books Directory) : Search the books in different category easily from here. Ebookee (Free Download eBooks Search Engine!) Boksee (Electric Library. Download books free) : More than 2 millions magazines and books are available here.Mirtitles (User Account) : Books from Soviet and history.Bookyards (Bookyards) : Garden of books. Library to the world.Free Books (Download Free Ebooks Legally) : Find books that are legal to be downloaded.Tech Book (Free /Open Access Online Computer Science Books) : Computer related book. Useful for CS students. Here is my another answer where I have suggested some more websites similar to library(dot)nu: Aabishkar Wagle's answer to Which are the best sites to download pdf books free? Thanks for reading. I will add some more to the list.

Getting good books online from site like library.nu is an opportunity I believe anyone will appreciate, If you have tried to use this site and you realized that it has been shut down well or does not contain the books you want I will like to introduce you to so many other sites that are similar to library.nu or the sites that take a step further from what this site has to offer you. So, to make my answer simple and straight to the point, I will begin with the good news that as far as you’ve got yourself an eBook reader, smartphone, tablet, or other portable device and you want to put some eBooks on it to take with you. Scribd.com Scribd, the online document sharing site which supports Word, Excel, PowerPoint, PDF and other popular formats. You can download a document or embed it in your blog or web page. STUVERA.COM The sites hosts over 20,000 books in various disciplines like Life Sciences, Business, Arts, Humanities, Social Sciences, Physical Sciences, Engineering, Health Sciences and any other field of study you can think of. ManyBooks.com ManyBooks provides free ebooks for your PDA, iPod or eBook Reader. You can randomly browse for a ebook through the most popular titles, recommendations or recent reviews for visitors. There are 21,282 eBooks available here and they’re all free!
